attributes.review:
This app is honestly the WORST application on the apple store. It’s really disappointing that apple has this on here. I’m thinking of TERMINATING the use of ALL of my apple products and subscriptions. 👎🏻 
Apple needs to REMOVE THIS APP. It has horrible set-up and the app is just overall USELESS. I’d give 0 stars if I could. The very existence of this app is INFURIATING. God bless. 😋
attributes.title: Worst freaking app ever (TT)🧚🏼‍♂️🌈

attributes.review: So this app is HORRIBLE NEEDS TO BE TAKEN OFF. It’s very laggy, and I noticed that the app started to move in different spots on my phone? One day it would be next to snap and the next it would be in a completely different place. Please take this off the App Store. Please don’t even try and make another app again Mr. Orange.
attributes.title: This app is trash.

attributes.review: As soon as the app was downloaded my screen went black and hackers began to leak all my private information. Now that it’s gone back to normal I started getting hundreds of messages and dm’s from random people about my “photos” 😉🤦🏻‍♀️ being leaked. This app has officially ruined my life. Thanks Trump.
attributes.title: Do not recommend🤮🤧

attributes.review: I thought it was a good idea to download this app, as I was heavily influenced by family members to download and support it. However, after having it on my phone for a while, I noticed that it was not doing what I thought it would, and for that reason I am leaving a bad review.
attributes.title: Didn’t work as intended

attributes.review: This app honestly isn’t what I expected and I totally regret downloading it, huge waste of my time. I thought it would let me know about our president and local news but it just take sup space in my phone. If you’re reading this, do yourself a favor and don’t get this app :)
attributes.title: Don’t wast your time

attributes.review: I am a 64 year old grandma and I just wanted to get my daily trump news. This application has messed up my new phone that was given to me by my grandchildren. Please think thrice before loading this application onto your cellular device. My new hip is more advanced than this preposterous application.
attributes.title: Granny made a mistake

attributes.review: I was not expecting these other reviews to be accurate, but after using it for about a week, I cannot deal with it anymore. The app all around is complicated and it is not worth my time at all. This made me not like trump at all as he created a horrible app. I’m done with this
attributes.title: Incredibly bad

attributes.review: i was on the app as usual because i love our sexy orange president even tho he is a child rapist and everything but i was only 2 months pregnant when i got on here and my baby literally killed its self. when i went to the doctors he said "even the fetus new how trash its life was going to be if he actually lived with a trump supporter."
attributes.title: THIS APP MADE ME HAVE A MISCARRIAGE!!

attributes.review: This app made my phone crash 🤮 it was horrible it started making a high pitch sound which I don’t appreciate because it hurt my ears just like his face hurts my eyes but anyways this app is just horrible NEVER again it’s useless. Anyways I highly recommend an app named tiktok it’s very fun hopefully this orange mf doesn’t ban it 🙃
attributes.title: Just cause 🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: I downloaded this app with hopes of following Donald Trumps campaign to make America great again. Unfortunately, the app was horrible. It was hard to navigate and it kept crashing. I’m not sure what went wrong with this app, but it’s not worth your time. Find your information somewhere else.
attributes.title: Terrible app
